{{ambox|type=clean | text=''This page is under construction and requires cleaning''}}\n\nThis page describes [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resource_Description_Framework RDF] binding of [[PERSEUS]] data model as part of [[ADAPT2 RDF Binding]] initiative. \n\n== Overview ==\n\nEach [[#pservice|PService]] can be set up to use several data sources - [[#configuration|configurations]]. Annotations each [[#pservice|PService]] provides can either be used as is, in the form of RDF, or can be interpreted. Interpretation is provided by [[#visualizer|visualizers]] and [[#syndicator|syndicators]]. Both [[#visualizer|visualizers]] and [[#syndicator|syndicators]] do the same work, but at a different level of granularity. \n[[#visualizer|Visualizers]] only interpret a piece of annotation [[#pservice|PService]] associates with resource or a feed. [[#syndicator|Syndicators]] in addition encapsulate access to the resource feed(s) in the form of user interface.\n\n== ER Model, Annotations and RDF Bindings==\n\n[[PERSEUS]] does not expose its model in RDF format. The only visible part is the annotations [[#pservice|PServices]] generate.\n\n=== ER Model ===\n\n* '''<span id="pservice">pservice</span>''' - Personalization Service itself\n** <span id="pservice.name">pservice name</span> - name of PService\n** <span id="pservice.description">pservice description</span> - description of PService\n** <span id="pservice.classname">pservice classname</span> - class that implements PService Functionality\n** <span id="pservice.hasConfiguration">pservice hasConfiguration</span> - related data configurations\n* '''[data] <span id="configuration">configuration</span>''' - data configuration that PService can use\n* '''<span id="visualizer">visualizer</span>''' - PService annotation interpreter\n* '''<span id="syndicator">syndicator</span>''' - PService annotation interpreter\n\n=== Annotations ===\n\n* personal level annotations - describe user\n** personal attempt count - \n** personal progress - \n** personal knowledge - \n* group level annotations - describe group user is part of (e.g. class)\n** [average] group attempt count - \n** [average] group progress -\n** [average] group knowledge -\n\n== See also ==\n* [[PERSEUS]]\n* [[ADAPT2 RDF Binding]]
